title: Donald Trump-ify your pumpkin this Halloween as a 'Trumpkin'
text:
In addition to being one of this yearâ€™s hottest Halloween costumes , Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump is now a trending topic â€” and a pumpkin decoration.
>> Read more trending stories
In fact, if you want to make your pumpkin look like Donald Trump, youâ€™re actually part of a larger trend called Trumpkining.
(Getty Images) A search through the hashtag #Trumpkin on Instagram and Twitter reveals the many ways people are honoring the billionaire GOP presidential hopeful.
Some are fairly impressive, with bodies or extremely detailed painting or carving.
